Articles.Content:
I thought this was an interesting design, so I took a shot at it. Here's the result! It's scaled to be roughly the same length as the real thing, just as my [Su-27](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131035-Sukhoi-Su-27-Flanker) is, and still performs pretty nicely.

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/81ef992rpl52vc3/Su-47%20Berkut.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/qqzFM)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T22:49:30Z" title="08/11/2015 10:49  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Yaeah**

Nice! It looks really accurate ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I tried to build one myself some days ago but i could not make it maneuverable ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). Anyways awesome replica!
